name: Ben Carlsson
body:
# Hey, what's up, hi
I'm **Ben Carlsson**. On the internet I go by *skoh-fley* or *glacials*. I'm 23 years old and I'm a departing Computer Science student at [California State University, Chico][1]. I'm a gamer in my free time. I dislike not only long walks and beaches, but also situations in which the former takes place on the latter. My working environment of choice is a command line.

*Things I'm very experienced at* include PHP, HTML/CSS, Linux stuff, and correcting your written English (but I admit that last one is sometimes more obsession than skill).

*Things I'm pretty good at* include Ruby on Rails, Java, C/C++, and relational databases.

*Things I'm okay at* include web design, Python, and coming up with lists of things I'm okay at.

[1]: http://www.csuchico.edu/
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
